configuration:
config.classes.supported.components Hadoop Comma separated list of components with support for Component Configuration classes mapping
agent.dir .ankush/agent/ Directory path for the agent after USER_HOME directory
agent.initialdelay 20000 Initial delay value for agent down check
agent.down.interval 60000 Interval after which agent is declared as down
gmond.conf .ankush/ganglia/conf/gmond.conf Gmond configuration file path
gmetad.conf .ankush/ganglia/conf/gmetad.conf Gmetad configuration file path
ganglia.rrds .ankush/ganglia/rrds/ Ganglia rrds directory path
ganglia.port 8649
ganglia.polling.interval 15
agent.jsvcDaemonBundleFile.name commons-daemon-1.0.10-src.tar.gz Name of the jsvc daemon bundle file
agent.daemon.class com.impetus.ankush.agent.daemon.AnkushAgent Class name of daemon class to start the agent execution
ankush.connectiontimeout 7000
hadoop.non.editable.parameters fs.default.name,dfs.http.address,dfs.secondary.http.address,mapred.job.tracker,fs.defaultFS,dfs.nameservices,yarn.resourcemanager.address,yarn.resourcemanager.resource-tracker.address,yarn.web-proxy.address,yarn.resourcemanager.scheduler.address,mapreduce.jobhistory.address,mapreduce.framework.name
hadoop2.propname.mrshuffleclass.2.0.0-cdh4.4.0 yarn.nodemanager.aux-services.mapreduce.shuffle.class
hadoop2.propval.auxservices.2.0.0-cdh4.4.0 mapreduce.shuffle
hadoop.conf.topology.data topology.data Contains host IP address to rack mapping
hadoop.conf.topology.script topology.sh Script used for Rack-awareness implementation
hadoop.conf.topology.script.relpath /Hadoop/topology.sh Resource relative path for Script used for Rack-awareness implementation(hadoop.conf.topology.script)
hadoop.conf.propname.topology.script topology.script.file.name
hadoop2.conf.propname.topology.script net.topology.script.file.name
hadoop2.javahome.yarnenv.targettext # export JAVA_HOME=/home/y/libexec/jdk1.6.0/
hadoop2.javahome.hadoopenv.targettext export JAVA_HOME=${JAVA_HOME}
hadoop2.javahome.hadoopenv.replacementtext export JAVA_HOME=JAVA_HOME_VALUE
hadoop2.template.javahome.value JAVA_HOME_VALUE
]
dependencies.cassandra.tokenGenerator dependencies/cassandra/token-generator Resource relative path for Script used for Rack-awareness implementation(dependencies.cassandra.tokenGenerator)
cassandra.topologychecksleeptime 15000 Sleep time in milliseconds between two topology check cycles.
cassandra.topologychecktimeout 240000 Timeout value in milliseconds for checking Cassandra technology data.
hadoop.jmxmonitoring.wait.time 10000 Wait time in milliseconds for response for Hadoop JMX data request
jmxtrans.installation.relative.path jmxtrans/ Relative path from Agent installation path for JmxTrans installation directory
jmxtrans.script.template.resultalias RESULT_ALIAS
jmxtrans.script.template.privateip HOST_PRIVATE_IP
jmxtrans.script.template.gangliaport GANGLIA_PORT
jmxtrans.script.template.serveralias SERVER_ALIAS
jmxtrans.script.template.gangliamasterip GANGLIA_MASTER_IP
jmxtrans.json.template.path /dependencies/jmx/jmxTemplate_ Resource relative path for directory with JmxTrans JSON templates for component specific monitoring
jmxtrans.json.filename.prefix jmxJson_ FileName prefix for JmxTrans JSON files
jmxtrans.json.jmxport.prefix JMX_PORT_ Prefix for JMX port text in the JSON template
jmxtrans.json.templatetext.host hostprivateip Text used for Host Value in the JSON template
jmxtrans.json.templatetext.gangliaport gangliaport Text used for Host Value in the JSON template
jmx.opts.targetText $JMXTRANS_OPTS -Djmxtrans.log.level=${LOG_LEVEL} -Djmxtrans.log.dir=$LOG_DIR
jmx.opts.replacementText $JMXTRANS_OPTS -Djmxtrans.log.level=${LOG_LEVEL} -Djmxtrans.log.dir=$LOG_DIR -Dserveralias=SERVER_ALIAS -Dhostprivateip=HOST_PRIVATE_IP -Dgangliaport=GANGLIA_PORT -Dgangliamasterip=GANGLIA_MASTER_IP
jmx.quorumpeermain.targetText ZOOMAIN="-Dcom.sun.management.jmxremote -Dcom.sun.management.jmxremote.local.only=$JMXLOCALONLY org.apache.zookeeper.server.quorum.QuorumPeerMain"
jmx.quorumpeermain.replacementText ZOOMAIN="-Dcom.sun.management.jmxremote -Dcom.sun.management.jmxremote.authenticate=false -Dcom.sun.management.jmxremote.ssl=false -Dcom.sun.management.jmxremote.port=JMX_PORT_QUORUMPEERMAIN org.apache.zookeeper.server.quorum.QuorumPeerMain"
jmx.dir.targetText.json ${JSON_DIR:-"."}
jmx.dir.targetText.log ${LOG_DIR:-"."}
jmx.dir.targetText.jarfile ${JAR_FILE:-"ankush-jmxtrans-all.jar"}
jmx.dir.jarfile.name ankush-jmxtrans-all.jar
jmx.default.port.quorumpeermain 12345
jmx.command.service.start start
jmx.command.service.stop stop
jmx.command.service.restart restart
jmx.command.service.status status
jmx.script.file.name jmxtrans.sh
java.process.list.cassandra cassandradaemon
java.process.list.zookeeper quorumpeermain
